sentences.en: He predicts a continuation of healthy profits in the current financial year.
sentences.cn: 他预计本财年能继续保持可观的利润。

sentences.en: His research could be seen as a natural continuation of the work done by Professor Lang.
sentences.cn: 他的研究可以看作朗教授所做工作的自然延续.

sentences.en: In a very real sense, post - war repression was the continuation of the war.
sentences.cn: 就真正意义上来说, 战后经济衰退就是战争的继续.

sentences.en: In the meantime, a continuation of public comment can only ruin us all around.
sentences.cn: 在此期间, 继续公开议论只能把事情全部搞糟.

sentences.en: It would just be a continuation of previous visits he has made to Israel.
sentences.cn: 这不过是他之前对以色列访问的延续。

sentences.en: It's the coalition forces who are to blame for the continuation of the war.
sentences.cn: 联合部队应当对战争的延续负责。

sentences.en: Many traders forecast a continuation of the market's recent bearish trend.
sentences.cn: 很多交易商都预测最近市场的下跌趋势还将延续。

sentences.en: The May number of the magazine will contain an exciting continuation of the story.
sentences.cn: 本杂志五月号将刊载该故事的动人续篇.

sentences.en: The service is overdue. Please contact us for continuation.
sentences.cn: 该会员服务已到期, 请联系我们续费.

sentences.en: The Year 2000 is a continuation of a man - made calendar.
sentences.cn: 2000年只不过是某一种人造的历法中岁月的延续而已.

sentences.en: This is the continuation of the story.
This lesson is a continuation of our last lesson.
sentences.cn: 这课是上一课的延续部分.

sentences.en: Tucson appearance in a dynamic fashion is still continuation of the design.
sentences.cn: 途胜在外观上依然延续了动感时尚的设计风格.

sentences.en: We will not tolerate a continuation of a violation of an understanding.
sentences.cn: 我们决不可容忍继续违反一项达成的谅解.

sentences.en: What we'll see in the future is, in fact, a continuation of that trend.
sentences.cn: 事实上，将来我们看到的是那种趋势的延续。

words.tran_cn: 因情况而异的；不一定的；偶然发生的
连续的，持续的；继续的；连绵不断的
分遣队；偶然事件；分得部分
持续；停留；续篇；诉讼延期
连续性；一连串；分镜头剧本
继续；逗留；维持原状（continue的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: something that continues or follows something else that has happened before, without a stop or change
